content.html: As adults, we do work during work hours &get paid for it. Most people dont work outside of work hours bc no pay. Why do we expect this of children, to spend all of their free time doing work when we don’t even want to do that?? Hw is important to an extent, but not all the time
content.value: As adults, we do work during work hours &get paid for it. Most people dont work outside of work hours bc no pay. Why do we expect this of children, to spend all of their free time doing work when we don’t even want to do that?? Hw is important to an extent, but not all the time
